resources.string: Click on the picture for more details.
Are you sure you want to clear all messages and restart the booking session?

System note: Booking succeed ! You can check the booking records in database by clicking upper right calender icon. Or you can restart the whole booking process again by clicking lower left restart icon.

System note: Booking AI system alpha test (multi-languages v0.1), all rights reserved (Kooler Media ®).

We provide custom made service for LLM AI agent App for dentist, restaurant, car rental… reservations for iOS, Android, Web, What's App. Line platforms.

Please contact us by clicking upper-left mail icon for business cooperation or for any further questions.

Thank you for your testing.

Thank you for using this application ("the App").

Request for register password email: 
koolerlee168@gmail.com

 Please read the following terms carefully before proceeding:

 1. Privacy Policy
 The App will protect your personal data in accordance with applicable laws and its privacy policy. Your data will not be disclosed to third parties without authorization.

 2. Data Usage Statement
 Data collected by the App is used solely for testing and service improvement purposes, not for any commercial use.

 3. Testing Purpose Disclaimer
 The App is provided for testing and research purposes only. Kooler Media shall not be liable for the accuracy, timeliness, or completeness of any data displayed in the App.

 4. Content Restrictions
 All provided materials and images are for personal or educational use only. Any commercial reuse, resale, or redistribution is strictly prohibited.

 5. Rights Reserved
 Kooler Media reserves the right to modify, suspend, or revoke the App's services and user access at any time without prior notice.

 By selecting "Agree," you acknowledge and accept the terms above.
